content:
This PR just failed to build with an error I don't recognise:

Run set -o pipefail
configuring mathlib 0.1
/home/ghrunner/actions-runner/_work/_temp/9b95bf74-d70b-403c-90ad-2f9c5ac83309.sh: line 4: 746655 Killed                  lean --json -T150000 --make src
     746656 Done                    | python3 scripts/detect_errors.py
Error: Process completed with exit code 137.

Just a random fluke? I can try re-running the job if that would help.
This is the new way of saying that a runner lost connection.
So I should just re-run the job?

Yaël Dillies said:

This is the new way of saying that a runner lost connection.

Are you sure? It looks to me like Linux's out-of-memory killer.
Usually runners lose connection because they run out of memory.
